TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapReflectionImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 生成从 .NET Framework 类型或 Web 服务方法信息到 SOAP 编码消息的映射。

span.span: Generates mappings to SOAP-encoded messages from .NET Framework types or Web service method information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供类型映射到 SOAP 编码消息部分，如在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中定义。The class provides type mappings to SOAP-encoded message parts, as defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 它是仅当时使用的 Web 服务或客户端指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述。It is used only when a Web service or client specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为 .NET Framework 类型生成到 XML 架构元素的映射。

span.span: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members) cil managed
Public Function ImportMembersMapping (elementName As String, ns As String, members As XmlReflectionMember()) As XmlMembersMapping

public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ ImportMembersMapping(System::String ^ elementName, System::String ^ ns, cli::array <System::Xml::Serialization::XmlReflectionMember ^> ^ members);

param.name: elementName
param.span: 从 Web 服务方法生成的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.

param.name: ns
param.span: 从 Web 服务方法生成的 XML 元素命名空间。

span.span: An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.

param.name: members
param.span: 属于 Web 服务方法的 .NET Framework 代码实体的数组。

span.span: An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.

summary.span: 为从 Web 服务方法收集的信息生成内部类型映射。

span.span: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.span: 到 WSDL 消息定义中元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时初始化 Web 服务或客户端，或者在反射 Web 服务调用方法。The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. 不需要直接调用它。You do not need to call it directly. 以下列表介绍的可能值`members`参数：The following list describes possible values for the `members` parameter: - Web 服务方法输入的参数。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服务方法输出参数，以及返回类型，如果不是 void，位于索引零。Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero. - SOAP 输入标头。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 输出标头。SOAP output headers.

span.span: to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, .

param.span: 如果指示 RPC 样式的 Web 服务绑定，则为 ；如果指示文档样式的 Web 服务绑定或 SOAP 标头，则为 。

span.span: to indicate an RPC-style Web service binding; to indicate a document-style Web service binding or a SOAP header.

summary.span: 使用指定类型返回一个对象，该对象用于从一个类型映射到 XML 表示形式。

span.span: Returns an object that is used to map from a type to an XML representation using the specified type.

param.name: type

summary.span: 为 .NET Framework 类型生成到 XML 架构元素的映射。

span.span: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

returns.span: 从一个类型到一个 XML 架构元素的 .NET Framework 内部映射。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework mapping of a type to an XML Schema element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 编码序列化的 XML 架构元素。The XML Schema element is serialized using SOAP encoding. 不需要调用直接的方法。You do not need to call the method directly.

param.span: 要为其保存类型映射信息的 .NET Framework 类型。

span.span: The .NET Framework type for which to save type mapping information.

summary.span: 在 实例的上下文中放置某个类型的映射，以供以后调用导入方法时使用。

span.span: Places mappings for a type in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用直接的方法。You do not need to call the method directly.

summary.span: 在 实例的上下文中放置派生类型的映射，以供以后调用导入方法时使用。

span.span: Places mappings for derived types in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.
